Plot: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.
Title: The Vow
Writer: Jason Katims, Abby Kohn (screenplay), Stuart Sender (story), Marc Silverstein (screenplay)
Actors: Rachel McAdams, Channing Tatum, Jessica Lange, Sam Neill
tomatoConsensus: Channing Tatum and Rachel McAdams do their best with what they're given, but The Vow is too shallow and familiar to satisfy the discriminating date-night filmgoer.
Country: USA, France, Australia, UK, Germany, Canada
